price: Yo heredaré la Tierra y a quienes están sobre ella. Ante mí regresarán.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
